item.description:
We are rescheduling this from the later June 29 date since several of us who have been waiting to bag Owlshead could not make it that day.... The plan is essentially the same. If it turns out to be rainy on Saturday, we will hike on Saturday the 21st instead, same time, same place!!

Owl's Head! We leave at 7:30 am from the Lincoln Woods Visitor's Center. Only 10 hikers in 1 group are allowed in a designated wilderness area. The round trip is 18 miles, 2,850 feet, completed in a book time of 10:25. If the group wishes to shorten the hike to 14 miles we can bushwhack in the open hardwood forest on the way in & on the way out.

This hike can be matched up with the Franconia Falls hike and camping option. These details are still being worked out, but this is a good time to camp out the night before the early hike.

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the NEHAAG disclaimer.

Make sure your hiker profile is complete so we can verify that your qualified to join us on this White Mountain hike.
item.how_to_find_us: Light green Subaru Outback with Bike Rack on back
item.why: It'll be fun to do it as a team. The Owl Gang!
item.name: Owlshead!
